title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1177/86 of 21 April 1986 amending Regulations (EEC) No 1311/85 and No 1310/85 as regards the time limits for granting certain premiums in the beef and veal sector
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 1177/86
of 21 April 1986
amending Regulations (EEC) No 1311/85 and No 1310/85 as regards the time limits for granting certain premiums in the beef and veal sector
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. In Article 1 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 1311/85, '6 April 1986' shall be replaced by '27 April 1986'.
2. In Articles 1 (1) and 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 1310/85, '6 April 1986' shall be replaced by '27 April 1986'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 7 April 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
